verbs.description: [ARG0: Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer ( Screen Capture ) Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer] [V: said] [ARGM-LOC: on the Senate floor] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday] [ARG1: that Donald Trump “ is guilty of creating a real national security threat every time he picks up his cell phone to call Sean Hannity or Rudy Giuliani] . ”

Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer ( Screen Capture ) Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer said on the Senate floor on Thursday that [ARG1: Donald Trump] “ [V: is] [ARG2: guilty of creating a real national security threat every time he picks up his cell phone to call Sean Hannity or Rudy Giuliani] . ”
